snippet: Surgeon General Regina Benjamin left her job on Tuesday and said she would return to work at the clinic she founded in Bayou La Batre, Ala.
abstract: Surgeon General Regina Benjamin leaves her job and says she will return to work at clinic she founded in Bayou La Batre, Ala; Dr Benjamin gave no reason for her departure when she announced she was stepping down, fueling speculation that she may run for Congress.
lead_paragraph: Surgeon General Regina Benjamin left her job on Tuesday and said she would return to work at the clinic she founded in Bayou La Batre, Ala.
